name: Space Pool (Eduardo Soto - sotocodes)
description:
Try and get the space pool balls into their colored black holes. Sort of like a minigolf game. Unity WebGL Version Available: http://games.sotocodes.com/Space%20Pool/

Place the white ball in the red area and hit it to collide with the other balls, if you fail to dunk the balls into their holes you can press R to reset level.

A lot of features are not implemented and a lot of modifications are planned, this is after all a very short prototype, expect a lot of improvements and changes.

Any feedback welcome, criticism welcome as well but keep in mind that I am probably more aware of pleeenty of bugs and issues in this current build!
